name: Sparta
startIntroPart2: Leonidas I was a king of the Greek city-state of Sparta, and the 17th of the Agiad line, a dynasty which claimed descent from the mythical demigod Heracles. Leonidas I was a son of King Anaxandridas II. He succeeded his half-brother King Cleomenes I to the throne in c. 489 BC. His co-ruler was King Leotychidas.
declaringWar: Good, then i shall die obedient to our law!
I wield the peak of a thousand spears!
defeated: Those who lived by the sword shall die by the sword.
introduction: As superior military strength of Greece herself, i am Leonidas I of the formidable army of the 300 Spartans.
neutralHello: Before you speak, Stranger, know that in Sparta everyone, even a king's messenger is held accountable for the words of his voice. Now what message do you bring?
neutralNo: By the citizens of Sparta we humbly refuse.
